logTemplate:
<%*
if (typeof log !== "undefined") {
  if (log.mode == "WORK") {
    if (!log.finished) {
      tR = `ðŸŸ¡ Focused ${log.task.name} ${log.duration} / ${log.session} minutes`;
    } else {
      tR = `ðŸ… Focused ${log.task.name} ${log.duration} minutes`;
    }
  } else {
    tR = `â˜•ï¸ Took a break from ${log.begin.format("HH:mm")} to ${log.end.format("HH:mm")}`;
  }
} else {
  tR = `Log data is not available. Ensure the Pomodoro session is active and logging.`;
}
%>
